results.title: Home Free
results.overview: As college students Jake and Jan struggle to stay afloat in the current economic climate, a lucrative business opportunity presents itself through their angel investor and landlord, George. After an unfortunate series of events, the deal suddenly falls apart, and the couple, now further in debt, takes drastic measures to eliminate George to collect a large sum of money. But things do not always go to plan and after numerous failed attempts to wipe out their intended target, the couple goes on the run with George in close pursuit to even the score.

results.title: Ananta
results.overview: A girl named Tania loved to paint and was seen as weird by almost everyone, until a village boy joined her class and took care of her when nobody else can. Their bond turned stronger and more intense after signing a business partnership. When a charming art businessman also took part in her life, Tania's mind juggled between her best friend, her lover, and her late dad whom she missed.

results.title: Ruth
results.overview: In the same year that war broke in the portuguese colonies, another conflict was taking place between the most powerful football clubs in the country. The target, a young player from Mozambique named Eusébio da Silva Ferreira...

results.title: Work Without Author
results.overview: German artist Kurt Barnert has escaped East Germany and now lives in West Germany, but is tormented by his childhood under the Nazis and the GDR regime.

results.title: Teu Mundo não cabe nos Meus Olhos
results.original_title: Teu Mundo não cabe nos Meus Olhos

results.title: Sobibor
results.overview: Based on the true story, international historical project “Sobibor” is dedicated to the heroism of the Soviet o cer Alexander Pechersky. During the great Patriotic war, being in a Nazi concentration camp Sobibor he managed to do the impossible — for only three weeks to organize a revolt and mass escape of the prisoners. Part of the escapees were caught and shot, and the rest led by Pechersky managed to escape and joined the partisans.

results.title: The Hit
results.overview: Two hit men awaits their target in an empty shop lot, but the job has been delayed and they wait into the long night.

results.title: The Night I Swam
results.overview: Snow covered mountains in Japan. Every night, a fisherman makes his way to the market in town.  His 6 year old son is awoken by his departure and finds it impossible to fall back to sleep. In the sleeping household, the young boy draws a picture he then slips into his satchel. On his way to school, still drowsy, he strays off the path and wanders into the snow...

results.title: County Line
results.overview: Sheriff Rockwell is settling into an unwanted retirement until his old war buddy and neighboring Sheriff is mysteriously shot. When overlooked evidence points to corruption, Alden must take the investigation into his own hands or else standby while a greater evil takes over the town.

results.title: Helsinki Fiction
results.overview: A young man moves back to his old neighborhood. A boy who lives in the same town, gets mixed in something that's way over his head.

results.title: _EXHIBIT_84xxx_
results.overview: A young couple in the midst of committing a home burglary experiences a life-shattering turn of events that spins their relationship out of control.

results.title: Lyfe
results.overview: Anthony is a young executive for a new tech start up and he's late to a meeting. He seems to have his life figured out, though. He's got it all, friends, money and the girl, but a closer look may suggest otherwise.

results.title: Mr. Casanova
results.overview: The 45-year-old Casanova is in exile in London, where he meets a 25-year-old woman who is unimpressed by his overtures ...

results.title: Champion
results.overview: Mark is an arm wrestler and dreams of becoming a champion. Jin-ki is a promoter and he dreams of turning his life around by using Mark. But then Marks sister Soo-jin appears and changes the live of everyone.

results.title: Adrift
results.overview: A woman and her fiancé find themselves caught in a hurricane after departing Tahiti by boat. She wakes up after being knocked out, only to discover him missing, and the elements threatening.
